name: SWAP (itch) (Hyo, Naemis)
description:
Submission for Mini Jam 73: Power

Joshua's final notes -

This game isn't quite where I had hoped it would be, but that's okay.  I wanted to implement additional bosses and further progression, but programming the entire thing myself from scratch and then having to spend the final day making additional art assets prevented me from deepening the mechanics. Overall, fun experience.

The WebGL build seems to interpret the colors differently than the unity editor did.

Public assets used -

Gravity Pixel Font
